play_style_summary: This player is an aggressive attacker, utilizing large elbow, knee, and hip ranges of motion for powerful strokes. They exhibit significant left-right asymmetry, particularly in wrist and elbow usage, suggesting a dominant or specialized left-sided attack.
combat_suggestions: Attack their right side, especially with varied spins.
Keep the ball short to limit their powerful full swings.
Force them to move wide to test their footwork and recovery.
Vary your pace to disrupt their rhythm.
